import React, { createElement } from "react" import memesData from "./memesData" export default function Main() { let toptext = document.querySelector(".toptext") let bottomtext = document.querySelector(".bottomtext") let [memeImg, setMemeImg] = React.useState("") let button = () => { let meme = memesData. meme.lenght console.log(meme) let randomMeme = Math.floor(Math.random(meme * meme.lo)) } return (
) }
